description: Adobe After Effects CC is the industry standard for creating amazing special effects on still images and video. In this VTC QuickStart! course, author and expert Dwayne Ferguson will guide you through all the tools you'll need to master to create those exciting effects. You will also learn about new features like Sync Settings, Warp Stabilizer VFX, Pixel Motion Blur, Refine Edge Tool, and the inclusion of Maxon Cinema 4D Lite. Then you will take your new skills and apply them to a complete workflow! This title is a self-paced software training course delivered via pre-recorded video. We do not provide additional information outside of the posted content. This title is a self-paced software training course delivered via pre-recorded video. We do not provide additional information outside of the posted content.
title: QuickStart! - Adobe After Effects CC
